state: The dinner is almost ready! It's only missing a grilled half of a bag of chips. -= Bedroom =- You find yourself in a bedroom. An usual kind of place. You decide to start listing off everything you see in the room, as if you were in a text adventure. You see a gleam over in a corner, where you can see a chest drawer. You can't wait to tell the folks at home about this! You can see an antique trunk, so there's that. You see a king-size bed. The king-size bed appears to be empty. There is a closed wooden door leading east. > -= Bedroom =-0/1
